title: Company Registration
content:
Company Registration Services

At The_Exim_Roof, we simplify the company registration process for startups and growing businesses. Whether you want to register a Private Limited Company, LLP, or Partnership, our experts ensure a smooth and hassle-free experience.

  • Guidance on business structure selection
  • Preparation & filing of legal documents
  • Fast and transparent registration process

Start your business journey with confidence and compliance.

title: GST Registration
content:
GST Registration & Filing

Stay tax-compliant with our GST Registration & Return Filing services. We help businesses obtain GSTIN quickly and manage monthly/quarterly filings without stress.

  • New GST registration
  • GST return filing & compliance
  • Expert tax consultation

With The_Exim_Roof, ensure your business runs smoothly under GST rules.

title: Import & Export
content:
Import & Export Solutions

The_Exim_Roof provides end-to-end support for import-export businesses. From IEC (Import Export Code) registration to documentation and compliance, we ensure your trade goes global seamlessly.

  • IEC registration
  • Customs clearance support
  • Export compliance & advisory

Expand your business beyond borders with our professional assistance.

title: Consultancy
content:
Business Consultancy Services

Our consultancy services help you take the right business decisions with confidence. At The_Exim_Roof, we provide expert guidance in compliance, finance, taxation, and international trade.

  • Compliance & legal advisory
  • Taxation & financial planning
  • Export-import business guidance

We are your trusted partner for sustainable growth.

title: Manpower
content:
Manpower Services

We provide reliable manpower services tailored to your industry needs. From skilled workers to professional staff, The_Exim_Roof ensures you find the right talent at the right time.

  • Skilled & unskilled workforce
  • Industry-specific manpower supply
  • Cost-effective hiring solutions

Grow your business with the right team by your side.
